oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Programming generally used in computer science that interrelate all the components such a way so that not only it proved to be use friendly but also fast in execution. Same concept is taken in this paper about organic farming (OF) by including all the components i.e. basic ideology of OF, including all the components i.e. primary industry , relation of OF with social ( food security),economical(self sustainable)and environmental issues ( climate resilience), infrastructure of knowledge, research market and policy support and acceptance. These all factors used in programming for promotion of OF in India with projection of converting 50% country into OF within 5 years. A separate planning also suggested for rainfed and irrigated area. It can be a status paper for all who are interested in policy making, production, research, marketing , social development ,environmental conservation with organic farming not only in India but also several parts of the world.
